content: the cherish hat here s a great hat that works up quick for the advanced beginner this super soft hat works from the bottom up materials ● 1 ball of lionbrand scarfie yarn 5 scarfie is on the thinner side of a bulky yarn ● size 5 0mm hook ● scissors and yarn needle stitches used ● ps puff ● v-puff v-puff create a puff chain 1 to close chain 1 again puff stitch in the same stitch chain 1 to close ● slip_stitch slip_stitch ● chain chain ● half_double_crochet half_double_crochet ● blo back loop only ● fpdc front post double_crochet ● decrease decrease will be used on half_double_crochet and fpdc ● ** repeat size fits most adults band size measures 22 ​ band row 1 chain 9 half_double_crochet in the second loop and across 8 turn ​ row 2-62 chain 1 half_double_crochet in 1st stitch half_double_crochet in 3rd loop for 6 st half_double_crochet in both loops in ​ last stitch finishing join short ends together by slip stitching together do not cut yarn and continue onto the body of the hat my band was 62 row add or subtract as many as you need to achieve your band size body row 1 chain 2 evenly stitch 72 half_double_crochet around the edge of your band slip_stitch to first st ​ 72 row 2 chain 2 *fpdc 2 half_double_crochet 2 skip 1 stitch puff 2 skip 1 stitch half_double_crochet 2* ​ repeat 6 times fpdc 2 half_double_crochet slip_stitch to first stitch 72 row 3 chain 2 *fpdc 2 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet on top of puff 2hdc in chain space half_double_crochet on ​ top of puff half_double_crochet 2 * repeat 6 times fpdc 2 half_double_crochet slip_stitch to first st 72 row 4 chain 2 *fpdc 2 half_double_crochet 2 v-puff in chain space created 2 row below ​ overtop the previous half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2* repeat 6 times fpdc 2 half_double_crochet slip_stitch to top of first st 72 repeat row 3 and 4 5 times for a snug skull cap ​ 6 times for a looser beanie great for pom poms or ​ 7 times for a slouchy fit pictured above ​ reducing the crown and closing row 1 chain 2 *fpdc 2 decrease half_double_crochet half_double_crochet on top of puff 2hdc in chain space half_double_crochet on ​ top of puff decrease half_double_crochet * repeat 6 times fpdc 2 half_double_crochet slip_stitch to first st row 2 chain 2 *decrease fpdc half_double_crochet single puff in chain space created 2 row ​ ​ ​ below overtop the previous half_double_crochet half_double_crochet* repeat 6 times decrease fpdc half_double_crochet slip_stitch to top of first st row 3 *fpdc half_double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet* repeat around end with a half_double_crochet slip_stitch to top of first ​ stitch row 4 *fpdc decrease half_double_crochet* around ​ sew closed that s it you re done add this as a project in ravelry
